messages.text: And are our soldiers effective there?
Do you only have visual for your area?
How did they get past the fence?
But honestly, guard duty at our base also seems a bit strained
I haven't heard anything beyond that
I only heard they infiltrated settlements in Samaria
Girls, there was a report about the lookout soldiers at both Nahal Oz and Kissufim on Channel 12, but it wasn't live. Rewind to watch it if you have the option and want to see what happened
You could watch to know what happened
No, Sapir. I know what happened, and I'm not watching. And Mom isn't either. We can't. It's too hard for us.
You could have been stationed at Nahal Oz at that time. You're on lookout toward Gaza 50% of the time. And you do one-on one-off shifts, meaning 50% rotation. It could have been you there.
